content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-10, 25)
Consists of the following entities:
- Offshore pump (position -10.5, 25.5)
- Boiler (not successfully placed)
- Steam engine (not successfully placed)

### Copper plate mine at position(x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x1) and a furnace at position(y1)
- Burner mining drill (position x2) and a furnace at position(y2)
- Burner mining drill (position x3) and a furnace at position(y3)

### Copper cable factory
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x1) and a furnace at position(y1)
- Assembling machine at position(z1) and inserter at position(a) that puts into assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position) that connects the furnace at position y1 to assembling machine at position(z1)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing boiler and steam engine
- Ensure to find a suitable position that is not overlapping with water or other entities before attempting to place a boiler or steam engine.

### Errors when connecting offshore pump to boiler
- Verify that the pipe connection does not overlap with existing entities or water. Ensure that the positions are valid for connection.

### Errors when checking chest inventory
- Confirm that the wooden chest exists at the specified position before attempting to check its inventory.

### Errors when adding coal to the boiler
- Make sure that the boiler is placed correctly and is within range of a nearby entity that can accept coal before attempting to insert coal.
